alert-message:
Hello,

This is an automated email notifying site [record-dag-label] that their site has been randomised successfully.

Randomisation date/time: [site_rand_datetime]

Randomisation group: [site_rand_grp]

Kind regards,

NEWS-HEAT

Email addresses can be added to, removed from, or updated on the mailing list for this site by updating the [site_details_arm_3][form-link:notification_email_addresses] form.
